error.message: Class Drupal\component_schema\Event\ComponentStorageTransformEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Class Drupal\component_schema\Template\ComponentTwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
